meanings.definition: Resembling a goose in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The fluffy yellow duckling looked very goosy.
meanings.sent2: The honking sound coming from the pond was a goosy noise.
meanings.sent3: The goosy costume made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her goosy walk reminded me of a graceful swan.
meanings.sent5: The goosy feathers on the pillow were soft and comforting.

meanings.definition: Feeling or causing a sensation of goosebumps.
meanings.sent1: The cold wind made her skin feel goosy.
meanings.sent2: The spooky story gave me a goosy feeling.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected chill in the room made her goosy all over.
meanings.sent4: The eerie silence sent a goosy shiver down her spine.
meanings.sent5: The horror movie was so scary, it left everyone feeling goosy.

meanings.sent1: The loud bang made the goosy cat jump.
meanings.sent2: She was goosy and nervous around loud noises.
meanings.sent3: The goosy puppy barked at its own reflection in the mirror.
meanings.sent4: The goosy child screamed when the balloon popped.
meanings.sent5: The goosy rabbit ran away at the slightest sound.
